content: If I may ask, what makes something a good fit for the internal changes section of the relnotes?
The closest thing I have to a criterion I can put into words is "largish, cool, non-feature changes, especially if they fix something (whether bugs or perf) for a user".

Sounds like a good definition to me :)

I think it also tends to be changes that were a long time in coming, and where the team is very glad and excited to have completed them.
